sentence: Monday on FNC’s “The Ingraham Angle,” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) condemned the Biden administration’s use of government power to infringe on the exercise of First and Second Amendment rights.
author: Jeff Poor
title: Jordan: ‘Scary Stuff’ What the Biden Administration Has Done with First Amendment Rights, Second Amendment Liberties
